text:
[[Korth]]'s Cathedral to the [[Sovereign Host]] is a massive house of worship at
the heart of the city's Temple Ward. Travelers come from
miles around to worship there and see the Dome of
the Twelve Moons, the inside of which has a magically
animated starscape said to predict the future.

The Cathedral was damaged during the [[Last War]] in the [[Cyran|Cyre]] siege of the early 970s YK; after the [[Treaty of Thronehold]], Prelate [[Roerith|Alinda Roerith]] led the renovation of the cathedral, restoring it to its former glory.
title: Cathedral to the Sovereign Host
